sentences.en: a young woman pushing a pram
sentences.cn: 推着婴儿车的年轻女子

sentences.en: Because of the pram in the hall.
sentences.cn: 原因在于门厅里的婴儿车.

sentences.en: Chapter 1 depicts the development of both the phase - change material and PRAM.
sentences.cn: 第1章介绍相变存储器材料GeSbTe的特性以及相变存储器的特性.

sentences.en: Enjoying a hot donut and being there after waking up from my pram!
sentences.cn: 在车上就睡着了,起来正赶上吃个热乎乎的面包圈!

sentences.en: I was struck all of a heap to see Mr Brown pushing a pram.
sentences.cn: 看到布朗先生推着一辆送牛奶的手推车我非常吃惊.

sentences.en: I'd like to know who's been messing about with the pram.
sentences.cn: 我想知道是谁在瞎摆弄这辆婴儿车。

sentences.en: I've just had to step over a pram to get in here tonight.
sentences.cn: 我今晚不得不抬高手推车抵达这里.

sentences.en: Mary wheeled the pram along the street.
sentences.cn: 玛丽推着四轮婴儿车在街上走.

sentences.en: Next came a mother with a very small baby who was pushing a pram.
sentences.cn: 接着进来的一位母亲带着个小孩推着个摇篮车.

sentences.en: She ran in chase of the pram.
She sat the baby up in the pram.
sentences.cn: 她把孩子放在婴儿车里坐着.

sentences.en: The baby had been snatched from its pram.
sentences.cn: 那婴儿被人从婴儿车中劫走了.

sentences.en: The big doll, sitting in her new pram smirking, could hear it quite plainly.
sentences.cn: 大娃娃坐在崭新的童车里,满脸痴笑, 能听得一清二楚.

sentences.en: They brought along Laura Jane in a pram.
sentences.cn: 他们把劳拉·简放在婴儿车里带来了。

sentences.en: You'll have that pram if you do not take more care.
sentences.cn: 如果你不多加小心的话,会把那辆婴儿车弄翻的.

words.tran_cn: 婴儿车；送牛奶用的手推车

trans.tran_cn: <英>（手推的）婴儿车，（送牛奶的）手推车，平底船
trans.tran_en: a small vehicle with four wheels in which a baby can lie down while it is being pushed
